summary: Innovative and results-driven Full Stack Developer with 2 years of experience in building scalable enterprise applications using Angular, .NET Core, and SQL Server. Proven ability to lead technical initiatives, mentor junior developers, and deliver impactful solutions. Adept in cloud migrations and automation.

bullets: Built and maintained enterprise-grade modules with Angular and .NET Core.
Developed Claims Watch, an award-winning POC with UI from scratch and backend data processing using Python.
Led Key Vault migration initiative, resolving critical security configurations.
Spearheaded Azure 1.9 to 2.0 migration, ensuring seamless cloud infrastructure upgrades.
Built a dashboard to replace QlikView overnight, significantly improving reporting performance.
Created an Admin module to automate prod access provisioning (replacing manual batch jobs).
Designed a Param Table Module to enable self-service for parameter updates, reducing dependency on deployments.
Implemented Bulk Uploads module for catalog management.
Received Gold Excellence Award (Q3 2024) for outstanding performance.
Mentored interns across teams to ramp them up on project workflows and best practices.
Built an invoicing system with inventory management using PHP, JS, MySQL, and Bootstrap.
Integrated High Charts API for dynamic sales and inventory dashboards.
Executed test cases on early-access platforms, submitted structured bug reports.

education.role: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering (Networks)
